headline: Jim Cramer on Baxter: “They Are the King of Disappointment”
summary: Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently gave takes on. A caller asked whether they should continue to hold or sell the stock, and Cramer commented: “Oh my god, you know, Baxter, go buy Abbott Labs. I mean, I gotta tell you, Baxter’s been such an incredible disappointment. It’s painful. […]
